basics.label: Angular/C#/Fullstack Developer
basics.name: Andrew Ryzhkov
basics.summary: Liable engineer, well-experienced in fullstack web development with a bias in cybersecurity. 5 years experience in Cyber Security Center of the MoD. Knowledge of patterns, best practices. Angular, C#, NET Core skills

work.company: Cyber Security Center, Ministry of Defence
work.position: Cyberscurity senior officer of information systems
work.summary: I was responsible for integration between SIEM systems and Cyber Security Center API (which was developed by me). I was providing full CI/CD support for solutions including Docker technologies
highlights: Was a part of team which is developed **SIP Server** implementation for secure networks in MoD and using nowadays.
Developed and implemented **Cyber Security Center API** based on Angular & NET Core stack for structuring and centralized management.
Was responsible for continuous integration & development of **Cyber Security Center API** and providing **Docker** support
Managed GitLab server & CI/CD automation in Cyber Security Center overall
Participated in international excercises (Ambermist 2019, Vilnius, Lithuania. CWIX 2018, Bydgoszcz, Poland).
Graduated from Naval Postgraduate School, Monterey, CA, USA. Curriculum: 257.

education.institution: Military Institute of Telecommunications and Informatization the name of Heroes of Kruty (former KPI)
Naval Postgraduate School, Monterey, CA, USA

awards.title: Certified Ethical Hacker
awards.summary: A Certified Ethical Hacker is a skilled professional who understands and knows how to look for weaknesses and vulnerabilities in target systems and uses the same knowledge and tools as a malicious hacker, but in a lawful and legitimate manner

interests.name: Soccer
interests.summary: Passionate soccer fan, especially Messi's talent

interests.name: Traveler
interests.summary: Live with no excuses and travel with no regrets.
